message: I'm feeling generous, but I need the majority of the money to start my business. Let's get this over with!
I'm willing to give you a decent share, but I'm not getting taken advantage of!
Let's split this more evenly, Bob.  I'm willing to compromise, but I need a larger share to make this worth my while.
I'm not getting less than I initially offered. You're not getting the majority, but I'm willing to give you a decent share.
This is my final offer. It's the fairest deal, considering the decreasing value of the money. Let's end this and split the money.
